programme.title: Tvoja tvár znie povedome
programme.desc: Veľkolepá zábavná šou plná fenomenálnych premien, skvelých hudobných čísel a obľúbených slovenských hviezd v roliach svetových, ale aj domácich ikon populárnej hudby. V siedmej sérii sa divákom predstaví úplne nová a nemenej skvelá osmička osobností slovenského šoubiznisu. Svoje herecké, spevácke a tanečné schopnosti, ale v neposlednom rade aj zmysel pre humor, predvedú obľúbené herečky z markizáckych seriálových hitov – Viki Ráková zo Susedov, Lívia Bielovič z Druhej šance a Natália Puklušová z Oteckov, ktoré doplní populárna stand-up komička Simona Salátová. Mužskú štvoricu súťažiacich budú tvoriť víťaz ostatnej SuperStar Adam Pavlovčin, známy hudobník a famózny huslista Ondrej Kandráč, talentovaný herec a spevák Matúš Kolárovský, ktorý sa dostal do povedomia divákov v úspešnom seriáli Pán profesor, a napokon ďalší mladý herec Karol Tóth, ktorého diváci uvidia aj ako lekára v druhej sérii obľúbeného seriálu Druhá šanca. Na súťažiacich sa pozrie a ich výkony bude hodnotiť herečka Zuzana Kubovčíková Šebová, spevák kapely Desmod Mário „Kuly“ Kollár a po prvýkrát sa v porote predstavia hudobník Marián Čekovský a bojovník MMA Attila Végh. Šou bude opäť pod moderátorskou taktovkou Martina Nikodýma.

programme.title: Sekerovci
programme.sub-title: Hana. Komediálny seriál SR (2012).
programme.desc: Júlia sa vracia domov zo zdravotnej prehliadky riadne nahnevaná. Náhodou zistila, že sestrička v ambulancii je janova ex-priateľka, ktorú jej nikdy nespomínal. Jano sa prizná, že ho Hana prenasleduje, odkedy sa vrátli bývať do Timravian. Hana je však šikovná mrcha, podarí sa jej presvedčiť Júliu, že skutočná obeť je ona. Jano je zhrozený, keď zistí, že sa jeho bývalá a súčasná láska spriatelili. Pipo sa ráno prebudí s tým, že mu v hlave dookola znie telefónne číslo, no nepamätá si, ako k nemu prišiel. Zavolá naň a zamiluje sa do dievčaťa, ktoré mu zdvihne. Je rozhodnutý, že našiel tú pravú a chce sa oženiť. Láska ho mení na nespoznanie, až sa o neho všetci v rodine boja.

programme.title: Sekerovci
programme.sub-title: Dar. Komediálny seriál SR (2012).
programme.desc: Mama Sekerová má narodeniny. Ako každý rok, dostane od členov rodiny tradičné prektické aj nepraktické darčeky. Výnimkou je len Júlia, ktorá chce napriek Janovmu varovaniu venovať svokre niečo originálne. Efekt je celkom opačný – keď Sekerová nájde v obálke poukaz na kurz varenia, ako správna gazdinka sa na smrť urazí. Vytrestá rodinu tým, že ich nechá napospas samým sebe a dovzdá domácnosť na jeden víkend do rúk Júlii. Také niečo sa nestalo za celé dlhé roky. Všetci v rodine sa najviac obávajú najmä Júliinej modernej kuchyne. Júlia sa nevzdáva, verí, že sa jej podarí dokázať svokre, že postarať sa o rodinu je maličkosť.

programme.title: Dobre vedieť!
programme.desc: V dnešnej časti zabojujú s kapitánmi o výhru hereckí kolegovia Kamila Magálová a Roman Poláčik. Súťažná, no najmä zábavná relácia, v ktorej proti sebe nastúpia tímy Juraja Kemku a Vlada Kobielskeho. Každý z kapitánov musí za pomoci svojho hosťa zistiť správne odpovede na netradičné otázky, pričom často vznikajú vtipné situácie. Do tuhého ide najmä v závere relácie. Súperiace dvojice musia zodpovedať spoločnú otázku, pri ktorej vsádzajú sumu, ktorej výšku súperi nevedia. Víťazom sa stane tím s vyššou nahranou sumou.

programme.title: 2 na 1
programme.desc: V ďalšej časti si Adela s Danom vezmú „na paškál“ populárneho herca a moderátora Farmy - Mareka Fašianga. Zábavná relácia, v ktorej si dvaja moderátori - Adela Vinczeová a Dano Dangl - „podajú“ vždy jedného zaujímavého hosťa. Ten bude musieť absolvovať sériu rôznych úloh, skúšok alebo výziev, ktoré ho dostanú do neštandardných a nie celkom komfortných situácií. Diváci sa môžu tešiť na vtipné momenty a reakcie, ktoré vzniknú pod vplyvom nečakaných udalostí.

programme.title: Afrika 2007 - Slnko a tiene Afriky
programme.sub-title: Cestovateľský príbeh Henricha Krejču a Matúša Sirotu
programme.desc: Cestovateľský príbeh Henricha Krejču a Matúša Sirotu

programme.title: Susedia
programme.sub-title: Komediálny seriál SR (2018).
programme.desc: Bomberos: Situácia na lesnej správe je kritická. Veci vzala do svojich rúk striktná Františkova mama a všetci sú z toho nešťastní. Podarí sa predsedovi zbaviť príliš aktívnej sekretárky? Andrejka má množstvo „sledovateľov“ na svojom webovom profile a neustále dokumentuje „selfíčkami“ každý svoj krok. Zuzana, ktorá predáva nový denný krém pre ženy „Bomberos“ to chce využiť. Pri zverejnení fotografie s textom sa však pritrafí zásadná chyba. Poštár sa snaží zistiť neznámu adresátku listu vo veršoch, ktorý prezrádza aj sladké tajomstvo.

programme.title: Susedia
programme.sub-title: Komediálny seriál SR (2018).
programme.desc: Oteckovia: Pri upevňovaní nestabilnej police sa László prevŕta až k susedom. V minulej časti sa odhalilo, že Milka je tehotná! František chce zistiť, kto je otcom dieťaťa. Podozrieva každého muža. Ani susedka Andrejka nevie, kto je jej biologický otec a mohol by to byť László, možno dokonca aj František. Spoja sa oba byty novými dverami? Pozná poštár tajomstvo dvojičiek Čontóšových? A kto je teda otcom koho?

programme.title: Susedia
programme.sub-title: Komediálny seriál SR (2018).
programme.desc: Mafia: László má vši, František zas niekde chytil kliešťa. Martu Sladkú hľadá Oleg, jej ruský švagor. Všetko nasvedčuje tomu, že je to mafiánsky zabijak. Hľadá vzácny „Modrý diamant“, ktorý mal byť súčasťou Voloďovej pozostalosti. Vie o tom Marta niečo viac? Alebo sa „poklad“ skrýva na nečakanom mieste?

programme.title: Susedia
programme.sub-title: Komediálny seriál SR (2018).
programme.desc: Miss lesa: Konečne sobota! František aj László si chcú užiť voľný deň. Zuzana však pracuje na plné obrátky a v byte je nevídaný pohyb tovaru a zákazníkov. Ildikó zase priviedla domov celý žiacky orchester nacvičovať na akadémiu. Navyše predseda lesnej správy zabudol na výzvu z ministerstva a do pondelka treba zabezpečiť nábor brigádnikov. Podarí sa zorganizovať „Miss lesa“? Nahovoriť na účasť Andrejku? A čo ak sa na miss zúčastní aj predsedova dcéra?

programme.title: Horná Dolná
programme.sub-title: Únos. Komediálny seriál SR (2020).
programme.desc: Starosta veľmi ťažko zvláda oslavu svojho životného jubilea. Ďuro s doktorom a chlpáčmi sa mu pokúsia pomôcť. A zvolia si veľmi zvláštnu taktiku.

programme.title: Horná Dolná
programme.sub-title: Tiket. Komediálny seriál SR (2020).
programme.desc: Ďuro vyhrá v lotérii. A Lacko vyhrá ešte viac. Dedina oslavuje. Lenže potom sa jeden žreb stratí… A začnú sa diať veci…

programme.title: Smotánka
programme.sub-title: Nevšedný svet kľúčovou dierkou
programme.desc: Spoločenské akcie, honosné večierky a zábavné párty - miesta, kde sa bežný smrteľník len tak ľahko nedostane, ale s našou kamerou je možné nahliadnuť na miesta, kde to vrie zábavou, nádhernými róbami a známymi tvárami. Najaktuálnejšie dianie v spoločenskom živote, svet recepcií a večierkov, exkluzívne rozhovory s celebritami a tie najnovšie pikošky - vyberte sa so Smotánkou do prostredia „horných desaťtisíc"! Relácia, v ktorej vás svetom smotánky sprevádza šarmantná moderátorka Erika Judínyová.

programme.title: Susedia
programme.sub-title: Komediálny seriál SR (2019).
programme.desc: Bzum bzum: Reštaurácia zarába len na organizovaní svadieb, ale Ildikó má problémy s hučaním notoricky používaných pesničiek. Ďalšiu svadbu si objednal predseda Lesnej správy pre svoju dcéru, víťazku “ Miss lesa 2018". Zuzana sa rozhodla prijať ponuku odísť pracovať do Ameriky. Františkova mama jej to chce vyhovoriť. Kto to so Zuzanou myslí lepšie - jej mamička alebo jej svokra? Dohodnú sa František a Lászlo s hygienikom, ktorý prevádzku reštaurácie nepovolil? Prežije Ildikó ďaľší hudobný nápor na jej sluch a psychiku?

programme.title: Susedia
programme.sub-title: Komediálny seriál SR (2019).
programme.desc: Halloweenska rozprávka: Blíži sa Halloween a František chystá v reštaurácii párty v štýle zombie. Druhú párty organizuje Sladká na tému "povolania". Lászlo chce, aby bola u nich doma, lebo Ildikó bude pokojnejšia. Nespokojný František sa opije. Ildikó chce skončiť so Zuzaninými videami, ale musí dodržať zmluvu. Nakrútia reklamu vo forme rozprávky. Zuzana je vlk a Ildikó Červená čiapočka. Lászlo vo Františkových veciach hrá horára. Andrejka je nešťastná, vrátila sa z Ameriky s megaprsiami. Ildikó má kontrakcie, ale v nemocnici majú kvôli bitke futbalových fanúšikov pohotovosť. Prístup na pôrodnú sálu si musí Lászlo vynútiť s puškou v ruke... Zarobia Lászlo a František na zombíckej párty? Bol poplach okolo pôrodu opodstatnený? Aké filmy mala Andrejka nakrúcať v Amerike?

programme.title: Susedia
programme.sub-title: Komediálny seriál SR (2019).
programme.desc: Ja rodím!: Ildikó je pripravená ísť do pôrodnice. Lászlo si myslí, že je to predčasné, ale musí sa podvoliť. Zuzanina mama síce chodí na raňajky k dcére, ale onedlho bude mať vo Vegas svadbu s plastickým chirurgom. Marta chystá v reštaurácii originálnu "beach párty" pred Vianocami. Fero sa bojí, že z modeliek v bikinách môže mať Lászlo problém a s Ildikó určite. Marta si je istá, že v pôrodnici sa nemajú ako dozvedieť o akcii. Zuzkina mama musí bývať u Zuzany, Majkl zrušil svadbu. Neostalo jej ani z čoho zaplatiť luxusný hotel. Ildikó sa v nemocnici cíti dobre, nič nenasvedčuje, že by mala rodiť, má však chuť na ananás. Zoženie Lászlo ananás aspoň na párty vo svojej reštaurácii? Naozaj sa o tom nedozvie Ildikó? Kde sa podarí Zuzane ubytovať svoju mamu? Stihne Lászlo pôrod svojho syna?

programme.title: Susedia
programme.sub-title: Komediálny seriál SR (2019).
programme.desc: Si moja nádej: František pripravuje oslavu pre príchod svojho menovca a krstného syna z nemocnice. Ildikó však ešte domov nepustia, kvôli žltačke. Horšie je, že Ildi dieťa pomenovala Ágošton a chce zrušiť Františka aj ako krstného otca. Lászlo mu to však nedokáže oznámiť. František už na privítanie zložil aj pesničku “Si moja nádej”. Zuzana tiež očakáva príchod pána Františka, investora, ktorý má záujem financovať jej internetový portál. Chystá prezentáciu a chce si na to prenajať reštauráciu. Všetci sú Františkovými prípravami dojatí a len Milka si trúfa povedať mu zlú správu. Nanešťastie sa zasekne vo výťahu. Aké to na nej zanechá následky? A ako to ovplyvní výsledok prezentácie pre investora? Podarí sa nakoniec presvedčiť Ildikó dojímavou pesničkou, aby zmenila názor a premenovala svojho syna?

programme.title: Partička
programme.sub-title: Záruka najlepšej zábavy
programme.desc: Petra Polnišová, Lukáš Latinák, Marián Miezga, Robo Jakab a Roman Pomajbo sú absolútni profesionáli, ktorí bez väčších problémov - hoc aj o polnoci, poslepiačky či pospiatky - zahrajú... V podstate úplne čokoľvek! A presne o to v medzičasom už kultovej zábavnej šou Partička ide - nenechať sa zaskočiť hocako absurdne znejúcim zadaním diabolského moderátora Dana Dangla a na veľkú radosť divákov v štúdiu i pred obrazovkami improvizovať ako o život! To, že ide o kráľovsky zábavný test invenčnosti a talentu všetkých zúčastnených, ale aj poriadny záber na ich nervy, napnuté na prasknutie, hádam ani netreba zvlášť zdôrazňovať. Nik si totiž nemôže byť istý tým, čo sa stane a ako celý večer dopadne, ani len oni sami nie!

programme.title: Susedské prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Starosta: Strelkovci a Turianovci sú susedmi dlhé roky. Majú medzi sebou dobré vzťahy, pravidelne sa navštevujú a keď treba, aj si pomáhajú. Jedného dňa sa však všetko zmení – obe rodiny postaví proti sebe predvolebný boj...

programme.title: Varte s nami
programme.desc: Recepty šéfkuchára Marcela Ihnačáka a známej moderátorky a skúsenej pekárky Adriany Polákovej

programme.title: Svokra
programme.sub-title: Gizela Oňová pomáha rodinám, ktoré sa ocitli v ťažkostiach
programme.desc: Gizka Oňová sa ako profesionálna Svokra vracia na obrazovky s novými príbehmi. O pomoc ju tentokrát prosí Marek (36), ktorému sa rozpadá manželstvo. Jeho žena Silvia mu jedného dňa oznámila, že ho už nemiluje, rozvod však odmieta. Majú spolu štyri deti, ktoré sú dennodenne vystavené hádkam a celú situáciu znášajú najťažšie. Najstarší syn sa dokonca pokúsil o samovraždu. Marek dúfa, že Svokre sa podarí vyriešiť túto ťažkú situáciu a pomôže jeho rodine nájsť pokoj a lásku.

programme.title: Susedia
programme.sub-title: Komediálny seriál SR (2021).
programme.desc: Svadobné fotografie: Ildikó sa vracia domov ráno v župane. László je zarazený a uvažuje, či má začať žiarliť. Viac ho ale prekvapia veľké svadobné fotografie Milky a Gergeja, ktoré dala Ildikó urobiť trojmo pre všetky rodiny. Jednu hneď odnesie susedom. Andrejka sa postupne so všetkými lúči, sťahuje sa do Viedne. František a László zháňajú celebritu na slávnostný výstrel v Deň Svätého Huberta - zahájenie poľovníckej sezóny. Keď Ildi nesie fotografiu Gergejovi, zastihne ho práve v objatí s Andrejkou. Ildi podozrieva Andrejku, že stále miluje Gergeja a chce ho získať späť. Jej podozrenie potvrdzuje aj to, že Andrejka vraj nechtiac zničí dve z troch svadobných fotografií... Poteší táto dekorácia všetkých tak ako chcela Ildikó? Kto je nový Andrejkin nápadník, ktorý si od nej požičiava peniaze a sľúbil jej byt vo Viedni? A kto sprostredkúva predaj jej starého bytu? Naozaj je Milkin život v ohrození, alebo je v nebezpečenstve niekto iný?

programme.title: Kuchyňa
programme.sub-title: Komediálny seriál SR (2017).
programme.desc: Šéf sa opije na oslave návratu kuchárov do práce a v tomto stave vyrobí škandál v Teleráne. Tento škandál však, nečakane, reštaurácii veľmi pomôže... Michal sa rozhodne ukázať Lucke, že mu na nej záleží, všetko sa však skomplikuje na oslave výročia reštaurácie, ktorú usporiada Čeky pre svojich zamestnancov…

programme.title: Susedské prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Alfonz: Vdova Marta s dospievajúcou dcérou Michaelou žije v novej bytovke. Veľmi si želá, aby sa dcéra stala lekárkou, no tú pri učení vyrušujú hluční susedia bývajúci o poschodie vyššie. K nim sa navyše nasťahoval dôchodca Alfonz, ktorý tvrdí, aké to má ťažké...

programme.title: Chlapi neplačú
programme.sub-title: Rodinný seriál SR (2014).
programme.desc: Ján sa rozhodne Michalovi dôverovať a Michal tak konečne získa aspoň jedného blízkeho človeka, o ktorého sa môže oprieť. Zorba má pre Gejzu novú úlohu - získať informácie o Jevgenijovi.

programme.title: V mene zákona
programme.sub-title: Krimiseriál SR
programme.desc: Krimiseriál SR

programme.title: Rodinné prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Šokujúce obvinenie: Laura a Miloš sú svoji už takmer rok. Miloš pracuje ako riaditeľ súkromného gymnázia, Laura sa venuje domácnosti. Oboch zaskočí správa, keď Miloša obviní jedna zo žiačok, že ju sexuálne obťažoval. Laura však svojmu manželovi verí...

programme.title: Susedské prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Vystúpenie: Od rozchodu s partnerom pred desiatimi rokmi žije Monika sama s dcérou Klárou. Vzťahy s mužmi na základe zlej skúsenosti vzdala. Mužov zvykne veľmi rýchlo odstrihnúť zo svojho života, lebo sa nechce znovu popáliť. Až natrafí na nového suseda Mateja...

programme.title: Rodinné prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Misky váh: Ema s Andrejom sú manželmi tri roky a jediné, čo im chýba ku šťastiu je dieťa. Ema výborne vychádza aj s mamou Kristínou a jej priateľom Viktorom, s ktorými sa majú stretnúť na večeri. Kristína však stretnutie bez vysvetlenia náhle zruší. Ema sa dozvedá, že Kristína pred ňou skrýva nejaké zdravotné problémy...

programme.title: Reflex
programme.sub-title: Ľudia - príbehy - emócie
programme.desc: Ľudia - príbehy - emócie

programme.title: Chlapi neplačú
programme.sub-title: Rodinný seriál SR (2014).
programme.desc: Po stretnutí s Gejzom začne byť Zorba nalomený. Cíti, že na Michalovom prípade naozaj niečo nesedí. Nora opäť prekazí stretnutie Sebiho s jej rodičmi, Ján však vymyslí spôsob, ako ho aj tak zrealizovať. Paula napriek zlému zdravotnému stavu ide do práce, čo jej neprinesie nič dobré.

programme.title: Tvoja tvár znie povedome
programme.desc: Veľkolepá zábavná šou plná fenomenálnych premien, skvelých hudobných čísel a obľúbených slovenských hviezd v roliach svetových, ale aj domácich ikon populárnej hudby. V siedmej sérii sa divákom predstaví úplne nová a nemenej skvelá osmička osobností slovenského šoubiznisu. Svoje herecké, spevácke a tanečné schopnosti, ale v neposlednom rade aj zmysel pre humor, predvedú obľúbené herečky z markizáckych seriálových hitov – Viki Ráková zo Susedov, Lívia Bielovič z Druhej šance a Natália Puklušová z Oteckov, ktoré doplní populárna stand-up komička Simona Salátová. Mužskú štvoricu súťažiacich budú tvoriť víťaz ostatnej SuperStar Adam Pavlovčin, známy hudobník a famózny huslista Ondrej Kandráč, talentovaný herec a spevák Matúš Kolárovský, ktorý sa dostal do povedomia divákov v úspešnom seriáli Pán profesor, a napokon ďalší mladý herec Karol Tóth, ktorého diváci uvidia aj ako lekára v druhej sérii obľúbeného seriálu Druhá šanca. Na súťažiacich sa pozrie a ich výkony bude hodnotiť herečka Zuzana Kubovčíková Šebová, spevák kapely Desmod Mário „Kuly“ Kollár a po prvýkrát sa v porote predstavia hudobník Marián Čekovský a bojovník MMA Attila Végh. Šou bude opäť pod moderátorskou taktovkou Martina Nikodýma.

programme.sub-title: Záruka najlepšej zábavy
programme.desc: Petra Polnišová, Lukáš Latinák, Marián Miezga, Robo Jakab a Roman Pomajbo sú absolútni profesionáli, ktorí bez väčších problémov - hoc aj o polnoci, poslepiačky či pospiatky - zahrajú... programme.title: Rodinné prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Dcéra alebo milenka: Študent Dalibor sa zamiluje do sestričky Radky, ktorá pracuje v nemocnici u jeho otca. Esemeska, ktorú si Dalibor omylom prečíta, však odhalí, že Radka má k jeho otcovi pravdepodobne oveľa bližší vzťah, ako si myslel.

programme.title: The games animals play
programme.desc: Escape the boredom of day-to-day survival and discover why animals just want to have fun sometimes. Take a journey around the world to investigate how creatures play in the wild, simply for the sake of enjoyment.

programme.sub-title: Growing Kids. Discovering what it is like to grow up in the animal kingdom.
programme.desc: Growing Kids. Discovering what it is like to grow up in the animal kingdom.

programme.sub-title: Episode 2. Liz Bonnin explores whether animals of different species can fall in love.

programme.desc: Shannon River. A journey along Ireland's longest river, the Shannon, through an emerald green landscape of rolling hills and sparkling waters; how Vikings, monks and kings have all made their mark.

programme.desc: The Waxwings and The Coyote. The team at the Toronto Wildlife Center tend to ill and injured animals, with the hope of returning them to their natural habitat.

programme.title: Podvodníci IV (5)
programme.desc: Zábavný dok. seriál. Podvodníci jsou klasický pořad Zone Reality. Podezřívaví jedinci se obrací na tento pořad a skupina soukromých vyšetřovatelů zjišťuje zda jejich partner má či nemá milostný poměr.

programme.title: Hlas sériového vraha II (2)
programme.desc: Dok. seriál. Seriál, který přináší divákům nejznámější případy běsnění sériových vrahů a to jak byli dopadeni.

programme.title: Nutkavá touha hromadit domácí mazlíčky (10)
programme.desc: Dok. seriál. Seriál nabízí intimní pohled do světa lidí s nutkavou touhou hromadit domácí zvířata. Buďte svědky toho jaké problémy taková obsese přináší do každodenního života.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Mike, a refined pug with sophisticated tastes, longs for a quiet life but is instead forced to defend his house from a bunch of furry intruders. Raccoons, turtles and Fluffy the Cat have a knack for showing up at the worst possible moments, dragging Mike into a series of unforeseen twists and turns! After his owners return, an exhausted Mike finds himself in the dog house once again, missing yet another opportunity to impress Cindy, the neighbor's elegant dog.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this 'bear's privilege,' except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: The Day Star. It’s the Night of the Stars in Wonderland and Lewis invites Alice to see the show. Afterwards, our two friends make an unexpected encounter in the garden: they find a little star that’s eager to see daytime! Alice is only too happy to help it fulfill its dream. But when it starts gradually losing its star dust, they realize there’s a risk it might not be able to rise back into the sky to shine once again alongside its relatives. Alice and Lewis must prevent that danger from occurring, ASAP! And so off they head to the Valley of the Night!

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: Tooth the Rescue! When one of Lewis’ teeth falls out, no little tooth fairy comes to see him. Instead, the whole of Wonderland converges upon him! Basically, in this world, a loose tooth is an opportunity for making a wish, which makes it a very sought-after commodity among the Wonderlanders!! In the midst of all this squabbling, Alice must use cunning to help her good friend Lewis hold onto his precious tooth!

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Super Spy. Mr Bean is obsessed by his favourite TV hero ‘Super Spy’ and is excited when his very own Super-Spy spy kit arrives in the post. While Mr Bean is pretending to be his favourite character and delighting in all his gadgets he spots some unusual goings on in the Bruisers’ house next door. Naturally Mr Bean assumes the worst and sets out to rectify the situation.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Scout Bean. Mr Bean inadvertently causes an accident which prevents Irma taking the scout troop to Big Bear’s Scout Camp. With the scout master and mini bus out of action Mr Bean steps in to save the day. As temporary scoutmaster Mr Bean enjoys his new role but his obsessive badge collecting wins him no friends within the group.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Back To School. Mr Bean cannot find anywhere to park other than the space he spots in a school’s car park. There’s a case of mistaken identity and Mr Bean finds himself teaching a class of unruly school kids. Bean uses every trick in the book to win them over and ends up teaching the headmaster how to be a success in school.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Lord Bean. Mr Bean is in the library studying his family heritage. Someone brings to his attention Mr Bean’s resemblance to a certain Lord Bean. Mr Bean sets off to track down his ancestral home (a castle) in Scotland where he is welcomed with open arms. But owning a castle is not cheap. Can Mr Bean escape before he runs out of money and has there been a case of mistaken identity?

programme.title: Thomas & Friends - Shorts XXV
programme.sub-title: Percy and the Skunks
programme.desc: Percy and the Skunks

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: The Crystal Contingency. Ella and Tilly’s playtime results in the smashing of precious crystals that are part of Mom’s meticulous experiments. Determined to replace them, Ella battles a pulsar and then a super-hot planet before she realizes her sidelined little sister could be a big help!

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Jupiter's Moons. Slippy’s excited to try out his new Rocket Boosters. He’s so excited that he overloads them and becomes stranded on a dangerous moon with Madhu. It’s up to Ella to jog Madhu’s memory so they can find the right moon and save Slippy!

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Maggie 2.0. When a botched update causes Maggie to reboot as “Magz”, a super fun party animal, Ella, Slippy and Madhu are excited! At least until “Magz” excessive ways put them all in danger! Now, our gang have to figure out how to get Maggie 1.0 back, pronto!

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Interstellar Message. When a probe arrives from Madhu’s sibling, our gang sets off to find something amazingly special to send back! But despite their incredible adventure to obtain some super cool moon water - Madhu realizes the most special “thing” they have isn’t a thing at all...

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time
programme.desc: Bugs Bunny Builders is a fun and exciting preschool series featuring your favorite Looney Tunes working at a construction company. Join Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use their amazing vehicles to take on the looniest builds ever. Along the way, they’ll learn valuable lessons and never give up because The Looney Builders always get the job done!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: The iconic cat and mouse rivals are back. The all-new series takes another look at the madcap slapstick and never-ending battle that has made Tom and Jerry two of the most beloved characters of all time.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Superfied. Dr. Bigby creates cookies that can give animals superpowers. Jerry and Napoleon sneak some cookies and they have fun terrorizing Tom an alley cat who has broken in to eat them. The tables are turned when Tom gets his hands on the cookies.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: The iconic cat and mouse rivals are back. The all-new series takes another look at the madcap slapstick and never-ending battle that has made Tom and Jerry two of the most beloved characters of all time.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Hop to It! Tom and Jerry have to go retrieve an ingredient for the witches' spell before sundown. Tom sees Princess Toodles and quickly forgets the mission. He competes with Butch in three trials to win over Toodles. Jerry struggles to keep them on track and to help Tom out with the competition.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends - Shorts XXV
programme.sub-title: Sandy Tidies Up
programme.desc: Sandy Tidies Up

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Bean Painting. Mr Bean is painting a picture of Teddy when he accidently squirts some green paint onto his brown wallpaper. Oh no! Bean needs to redecorate his room fast but ends up painting all the walls a garish lime green instead of brown. He’s so terrified of Mrs Wicket finding out that when he goes to bed he has some very weird nightmares – with a rather sickly ending.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Wrestle Bean. Mr Bean is no fan of wrestling. But he’s promised to take Mrs Wicket and her friend Mrs Wince to a big wrestling match in town. Bean finds himself lost backstage at the stadium and accidentally wanders through a door and straight into the wrestling ring where he finds himself up against Side Kick Rick. More by luck than talent Bean wins the match – only to find that now he has to fight the terrifying Bruise Force.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Rare Bird. Mr Bean needs to see a very rare bird so he can tick off every page in his bird-spotting book. But he soon gets bored as he waits in a hide for the rare bird to appear. Instead he goes home and paints a picture of the bird cuts it out and sticks it high up a tree in the back garden. Soon he is besieged by excited twitchers who think it really is the rare bird. They are all keen to get a snap and they’re willing to pay good money for a peek.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.sub-title: Bean's Safari. Mr Bean finds himself babysitting a baboon.
programme.desc: Join the strange but hilariously funny Mr Bean and his stuffed teddy on adventures such as avoiding an irate landlady or an evil one-eyed cat.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time
programme.desc: Bugs Bunny Builders is a fun and exciting preschool series featuring your favorite Looney Tunes working at a construction company. Join Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use their amazing vehicles to take on the looniest builds ever. Along the way, they’ll learn valuable lessons and never give up because The Looney Builders always get the job done!

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: Journey to the Moon. While delivering a yummy stew to the Queen, Alice and Lewis notice the moon is crying and that its falling tears are flooding the castle! Afraid her royal residence is about to collapse any minute, Queen orders Alice and Lewis to find a solution to this problem on the double! And so off they go to the moon, where a whole plethora of surprises awaits them.

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: Seam Stress. Today, Queen has decided to commission a unique dress from her talented Seamstress Card: she wants it made out of wild thread – a very difficult one to tame! And should her Seamstress Card fail to pull it off, she will be relieved of her duties on the spot! Alice and Lewis jump to it, coming up with all kinds of bright ideas to help out the poor card. As a result, in the end, a whole cat walk of dresses awaits the Queen!

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Interstellar Treasure Hunter. Dad gives Ella and Slippy a mysterious Treasure Map of their solar system. When Ella cuts corners as soon as she realizes where the final step is! But when that doesn’t yield them the treasure, she must learn to follow instructions. All of them...

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Speed of Ella. Ella’s super excited to check out the Orion flare stars with her family. She’s been looking forward to it for weeks. But when Madhu asks a favour and Slippy calls her for help, Ella can’t say no and might miss the festival entirely! Can she use science to get there in time?

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders

However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: In The Beginning. We open on a SOLD sign in front of what will be Rick and Ginger's house. Inside, the house is empty – no Rick, no Ginger, no Tom, no furniture. Just Jerry, who slip slides merrily across the bare floors – the place all to himself. That is until the front door opens and Rick and Ginger arrive in their new home. Ginger screams having just seen a mouse and tells Rick to get Tom out of the moving van. Like most cats in a new place, Tom doesn't want to come out from beneath the recently placed couch, but Ginger demands he catch that mouse! And so we watch the beginning of a lifelong adversarial relationship unfold one gag at a time!

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.sub-title: Splinter of Discontent. Tom & Jerry help Tyke with a splinter.
programme.desc: The iconic cat and mouse rivals are back. The all-new series takes another look at the madcap slapstick and never-ending battle that has made Tom and Jerry two of the most beloved characters of all time.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Uncle Pecos Rides Again. Tom and Jerry are in the middle of it when Tom hears someone singing the tale of a cat who met his unfortunate, painful end chasing a much superior opponent. The song is about underestimating your opponent. Every time Tom stops chasing Jerry, the music stops. When Tom resumes, the music resumes. This back and forth continues until the chase takes Tom right past a Singing Uncle Pecos. Tom skids to a stop causing Uncle Pecos to stop singing. Tom wants to prove the lyrics of Uncle Pecos song wrong, but in the end, Tom's ego proves to everyone, including himself, that he is very much the subject of Uncle Pecos cautionary tale.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.sub-title: Out with the Old. Jerry thinks that Tom is going to be replaced.
programme.desc: The iconic cat and mouse rivals are back. The all-new series takes another look at the madcap slapstick and never-ending battle that has made Tom and Jerry two of the most beloved characters of all time.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: While using a wand to make inanimate objects come to life to attack Jerry, Tom accidentally zaps a marionette (Marie Antoin-marionette). Now the cat and mouse have more on their hands than either one of them can handle! Sure the marionette pulls Hildie and Beatie's heart-strings when they are around (both are thrilled to have another girl in the house even if she is made of wood), but the doll delights in getting Tom into trouble when the witch sisters aren't looking. When Marie becomes too much for even Jerry to bear, Tom and Jerry have to figure out how to get rid of the little hellion! They brought her into this world, now they've got to take her out!

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Forget Me Not. Jerry brings Tom to consciousness. His partner has an aluminum bat on his head, arrow in his butt, bee stings on his arm, tire treads on his back, lipstick on his cheek and a terrible case of amnesia. Jerry must help Tom use the investigative clues on his body to solve what happened. The clues will take them to some destinations that may leave Tom more physically abused than when he started but in better mental shape (as each stop causes a little more memory to return).

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings II
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege" except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Momella Day. Ella always looks forward to Momella Day. And this Momella day promises to be the most interstellar yet, because they are going to see a small but powerful Red Dwarf star!

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: The Martian Chronicles. Priya has arrived from Earth to complete a school project about Mars. Priya is unfamiliar with the planet and a bit nervous about its huge dust storms. Ella, Slippy and Madhu convince her she needs to visit Mars.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: The Robot. Mr Bean fancies a game of golf so he creates his own golf course inside his flat and invites Irma to join him for a round. Their somewhat eccentric game takes them from sitting room to bathroom and through Mrs Wicket’s flat as they battle to be the winner of the First Bean Open Championship.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Ice Cream. Mr Bean wants an ice cream from the ice cream van. But by the time he gets to the front of the queue the ice-cream man has gone to lunch. Bean takes it upon himself to climb through in an open window and into the back of the van from where he starts to help himself. Unfortunately he soon attracts a crowd and is forced to serve a long queue of kids until all the ice cream runs out. When the ice-cream man comes back from lunch and drives away he is unaware that Bean is still hiding in the back of his van en route to the ice cream factory.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Birthday Party. Mr Bean is feeling very left out when he discovers that Mrs Wicket is having a huge party downstairs and apparently he isn’t invited. Bean tries every trick in the book to sneak himself into the party – even resorting to hiding inside an enormous cake. If only he knew the real reason for the celebration.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: In The Garden. Mr Bean’s attempt to cut the grass is thwarted by a pesky root which refuses to budge. When Mr Bean breaks his spade he heads to the local Garden Centre to find a replacement. But instead of simply buying one he enters a gardening competition to win one - judged by none other than the Queen herself! Its gardening gloves off when Mr Bean goes into battle with his rival green-fingered competitors.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends - Shorts XXV
programme.sub-title: Crystal Cavern
programme.desc: Crystal Cavern

programme.title: Alice & Lewis
programme.desc: Six-year-old Alice has a magical key that leads her to Wonderland. In this “other realm”, she’s met an endearing rabbit, Lewis, and the two have become fast friends – best friends to be exact! Alice loves going to Wonderland and teaming up with Lewis and her other friends, even if it means contending with the whimsical, hot-headed Queen. Each episode entails a visit to Wonderland, where Alice experiences a wacky adventure with Lewis, confronting the crazy, eccentric rules and conventions that reign supreme in this parallel Kingdom. Alice’s adventures always begin in the “real world” where she is faced with a particular situation. Her far-fetched experiences in Wonderland lead her to a positive outcome or gain insight which helps her to resolve this dilemma and thus, at the end of each episode, she returns happily to the real world.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz III
programme.desc: Blinkie Gets Her Groove Back. On the way to Ozma's weekly picnic, Dorothy and friends come upon Blinkie, a cranky old former witch who lost her powers long ago. To everyone's dismay, Dorothy invites Blinkie along. But she ends up loving it! Blinkie is overjoyed at the fun and friendship and is invited back the next week. The Wicked Witch gets a whiff of this and can't believe it! She lost her powers once and she didn't hang out with those goody-goodies. Maybe Blinkie needs help remembering her wicked roots, and her powers back. And the Wicked Witch has found a way to do it so Blinkie betrays her new friends in the process.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz III
programme.desc: DOROTHY AND THE WIZARD OF OZ is an animated comedy fantasy series that transports viewers back to the wonderful land of Oz. Following the defeat of the Wicked Witch of the West, Dorothy Gale (GREY DeLISLE) has been appointed Princess of Emerald City by Queen Ozma. Faced with obstacles at every turn – from flying monkeys to her arch nemesis, Wilhelmina (the Wicked Witch of the West's niece and protégé) – Dorothy bravely tackles her royal duties with her feet firmly planted in her magical ruby slippers.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz III
programme.desc: DOROTHY AND THE WIZARD OF OZ is an animated comedy fantasy series that transports viewers back to the wonderful land of Oz. Following the defeat of the Wicked Witch of the West, Dorothy Gale (GREY DeLISLE) has been appointed Princess of Emerald City by Queen Ozma. Faced with obstacles at every turn – from flying monkeys to her arch nemesis, Wilhelmina (the Wicked Witch of the West's niece and protégé) – Dorothy bravely tackles her royal duties with her feet firmly planted in her magical ruby slippers.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz III
programme.desc: Guardians of the Gates of Yawn. The Wicked Witch follows a clue on the silver slippers to Emerald City Clock Tower, putting all the guards in her way to sleep with a very powerful potion. But she gets more than she bargained for when she accidentally sets off every single alarm clock in the whole place and awakens the Quox, a giant silver beast slumbering beneath Emerald City! While Dorothy and friends are preoccupied with trying to deal with that thing, the witches dive deep into the tunnel the Quox came from for signs of the silver slippers. Dorothy and friends figure out the only way to deal with the beast is to put it back to sleep. And the only way to do it is by stealing the Wicked Witch's sleeping potion!

Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege" except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Mike, a refined pug with sophisticated tastes, longs for a quiet life but is instead forced to defend his house from a bunch of furry intruders. Raccoons, turtles and Fluffy the Cat have a knack for showing up at the worst possible moments, dragging Mike into a series of unforeseen twists and turns! After his owners return, an exhausted Mike finds himself in the dog house once again, missing yet another opportunity to impress Cindy, the neighbor's elegant dog.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Ditzy Home. Stephan upgrades the house's security system and it looks like Mike might be able to take a break from playing guard dog. The new system immediately detects when the raccoons are trying to break in and ejects from the property. Mike didn't even have to lift a paw. Unfortunately, the system works a little too well and quickly targets Mike as an intruder too. Now Mike and Freddy are on the same team trying to break in so he can defeat the errant security system and save Mercury and Fluffy who are still trapped inside.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz III
programme.desc: DOROTHY AND THE WIZARD OF OZ is an animated comedy fantasy series that transports viewers back to the wonderful land of Oz. Following the defeat of the Wicked Witch of the West, Dorothy Gale (GREY DeLISLE) has been appointed Princess of Emerald City by Queen Ozma. Faced with obstacles at every turn – from flying monkeys to her arch nemesis, Wilhelmina (the Wicked Witch of the West's niece and protégé) – Dorothy bravely tackles her royal duties with her feet firmly planted in her magical ruby slippers.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz III
programme.desc: Just for Kicks. The Wicked Witch decides she needs an army to replace the one that she lost and sets her sights on the all-female all-dancing army of General Jinjur. She lures the overworked and over-danced army of Jinjur away from her and has plans to turn their kicks destructive. Jinjur goes to Dorothy for help. They team up to create a new army to get the Witch's one away from her, but the only people they're able to recruit are Woozy and his friends. They're going to have to whip Woozy and the other animals into shape if they stand a chance of defeating the Witch's karate-kicking army.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz III
programme.desc: DOROTHY AND THE WIZARD OF OZ is an animated comedy fantasy series that transports viewers back to the wonderful land of Oz. Following the defeat of the Wicked Witch of the West, Dorothy Gale (GREY DeLISLE) has been appointed Princess of Emerald City by Queen Ozma. Faced with obstacles at every turn – from flying monkeys to her arch nemesis, Wilhelmina (the Wicked Witch of the West's niece and protégé) – Dorothy bravely tackles her royal duties with her feet firmly planted in her magical ruby slippers.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz III
programme.desc: North Meets West. With the Wicked Witch becoming more of a threat, Dorothy, Glinda, and the gang go to Tattypoo, the retired Good Witch of the North to see if she'll come out of retirement to help them fight against the Wicked Witch of the West and her silver slippers. Just as Tattypoo is about to agree, the Wicked Witch strikes and erases her memory, putting her out of commission. The Wicked Witch has a plan to trick the amnesiac Tattypoo into believing that she was an evil witch just like her before she lost her memory. It's up to Dorothy and friends to retrieve enough mementos from Tattypoo's past to help her remember who she really was.

programme.title: Alice & Lewis
programme.desc: Six-year-old Alice has a magical key that leads her to Wonderland. In this “other realm”, she’s met an endearing rabbit, Lewis, and the two have become fast friends – best friends to be exact! Alice loves going to Wonderland and teaming up with Lewis and her other friends, even if it means contending with the whimsical, hot-headed Queen. Each episode entails a visit to Wonderland, where Alice experiences a wacky adventure with Lewis, confronting the crazy, eccentric rules and conventions that reign supreme in this parallel Kingdom. Alice’s adventures always begin in the “real world” where she is faced with a particular situation. Her far-fetched experiences in Wonderland lead her to a positive outcome or gain insight which helps her to resolve this dilemma and thus, at the end of each episode, she returns happily to the real world.

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Welcome CoComelon! In CoComelon, Baby JJ and his family go on fun every-day experiences packed with things to learn and explore. There is always something new to learn in these everyday situations which any pre-schooler can relate to!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: Meet the Batwheels

programme.title: Alice & Lewis
programme.desc: Six-year-old Alice has a magical key that leads her to Wonderland. In this “other realm”, she’s met an endearing rabbit, Lewis, and the two have become fast friends – best friends to be exact! Alice loves going to Wonderland and teaming up with Lewis and her other friends, even if it means contending with the whimsical, hot-headed Queen. Each episode entails a visit to Wonderland, where Alice experiences a wacky adventure with Lewis, confronting the crazy, eccentric rules and conventions that reign supreme in this parallel Kingdom. Alice’s adventures always begin in the “real world” where she is faced with a particular situation. Her far-fetched experiences in Wonderland lead her to a positive outcome or gain insight which helps her to resolve this dilemma and thus, at the end of each episode, she returns happily to the real world.

programme.title: Alice & Lewis

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Flat Pack. Mr Bean is in need of a sturdy new bookcase and sets off to visit a furniture warehouse. He finds one that’s perfect but is outraged when he’s told he has to build the bookcase himself! Bean is unfamiliar with flat pack assembly and struggles to construct his new bookcase failing miserably when he discovers he’s one screw short. Mr Bean heads back to the shop only to find it’s closed!

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Holiday Teddy. Mr Bean decides to take Teddy on holiday to the seaside. But when he arrives at his hotel a spoilt little girl wants Teddy all for herself. And her protective dad only wants the best for his ‘princess’. An on-going tussle ensues between Mr Bean the little girl and her Dad resulting in a chase across the seaside town and onto the pier. No one comes between Mr Bean Teddy and their ‘relaxing’ holiday!

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: The Newspaper. Mr Bean is left in peace when Mrs Wicket goes off on her holidays. This means Mr Bean has free access to her daily newspaper. But every time he goes down to collect it from the letterbox it disappears. Someone is taking it but who? Mr Bean is determined to nab the mysterious newspaper stealer and uses a range of ingenious homemade traps in his quest to catch the sneaky thief.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Viral Bean. Mr Bean is trying to find a nice quiet place to read his book so he sets off for the Library. But instead of reading he becomes distracted by some funny online videos he sees on the Library’s computer. Before he knows it Mr Bean is recording his own video which is uploaded for everyone to see. Things start to go crazy when people check out his funny video and his popularity takes off. But does Mr Bean enjoy being in the public eye and how long will his celebrity last?

programme.title: Thomas & Friends - Shorts XXV
programme.sub-title: Kana and the Butterflies
programme.desc: Kana and the Butterflies

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Space Oddity. When a prized possession goes missing, Slippy’s sure the mysterious Alien Silicon Jellyfish took it! Ella’s pretty sure the Jellyfish doesn’t exist... but as the gang hunts for it, Ella learns that supporting her friend is what matters most!

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Runaway Rover. On the eve of Dad opening his museum of human artifacts on the moon, Ella and Slippy help him by “fixing” a lunar rover until it drives off, with Glitch on board! Determined to fix this themselves, our gang understands it’s best to admit your mistake and ask for help.

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Interstellar Treasure Hunter. Dad gives Ella and Slippy a mysterious Treasure Map of their solar system. When Ella cuts corners as soon as she realizes where the final step is! But when that doesn’t yield them the treasure, she must learn to follow instructions. All of them...

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Speed of Ella. Ella’s super excited to check out the Orion flare stars with her family. She’s been looking forward to it for weeks. But when Madhu asks a favour and Slippy calls her for help, Ella can’t say no and might miss the festival entirely! Can she use science to get there in time?

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time
programme.desc: Bugs Bunny Builders is a fun and exciting preschool series featuring your favorite Looney Tunes working at a construction company. Join Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use their amazing vehicles to take on the looniest builds ever. Along the way, they’ll learn valuable lessons and never give up because The Looney Builders always get the job done!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Looneyburg Lights
programme.desc: The Looney Builders prepare to host a big holiday lights festival in Looneyburg Park when an unexpected snowstorm prevents Looneyburgers from attending.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings II
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege" except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Entering and Breaking. When Rick leaves Spike in charge of protecting the house against burglars Spike steps up and trains Tom and Jerry to be his helpers. At first it seems like they are going to fumble their security jobs but then a burglar proves to be no match for our destructive trio.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Franken Kitty. Dr Bigby creates a machine to turn back the hands of time for his beloved cat Wilson. Tom is trying to break into the lab to eat Jerry and Napoleon and accidentally gets mistaken for a young Wilson and is taken home. Tom must convince Dr. Bigby he's got the wrong cat! Jerry and Napoleon are left with the real Wilson who is a mean vicious cat.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Haunted Mouse. Tuffy hires detectives Tom and Jerry to investigate the ghost hauntings in his house. At first Tom and Jerry think it's just his imagination but discover that the house seems haunted. They find out it's a rat who wanted to chase Tuffy out so he could live there with his family but is ok with sharing the home.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Tom-Foolery. Butch tricks Tom into switching places with him and sends Tom off to live the life of a street cat. Butch finds out that living Tom's cushy life isn't what it seems when Jerry makes his life difficult and Ginger's doting is humiliating. Tom finds that living off the street is tricky and difficult. They very quickly switch back to the way it was.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends - Shorts XXV
programme.sub-title: The Big Balloon Breakout
programme.desc: The Big Balloon Breakout

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Car Wash. Mr Bean's car is filthy so he gives it a good wash. His sparklingly clean car attracts the attention of other drivers who offer to pay Mr Bean to wash their cars too. Bean cannot resist and builds a car-washing contraption to help him out. But when a certain very posh visitor’s car gets damaged Bean thinks he’s for the chop.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Where Did You... Mr Bean chases Scrapper around Mrs Wicket’s flat but her sideboard tumbles over and when Bean sees a bit of fur poking out from under it he is horrified to think he has squashed poor Scrapper. Not realizing that it’s only his landlady’s furry hat Bean rushes what he thinks is a flattened cat across town to the vets in a desperate attempt to save his feline friend’s life.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Valuable Lessons. Mr Bean helps Mrs Wicket collect up all her money together after she witnesses a robbery. With all her cash safely locked in a bank vault Mrs Wicket suddenly finds she has a new admirer but Mr Bean doesn’t trust this smooth operator one bit. With wedding bells ringing Mr Bean races against time to solve the mystery and save Mrs Wicket…and her money.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Halloween. Mr Bean loves Halloween and prepares to give the neighbourhood kids some tricks and treats they won’t forget. But when Mr Bean gets carried away with his spooky pranks he becomes the target of even more fiendish tricks from his neighbours the Bruisers.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time
programme.desc: Bugs Bunny Builders is a fun and exciting preschool series featuring your favorite Looney Tunes working at a construction company. Join Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use their amazing vehicles to take on the looniest builds ever. Along the way, they’ll learn valuable lessons and never give up because The Looney Builders always get the job done!

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: The Day Star. It’s the Night of the Stars in Wonderland and Lewis invites Alice to see the show. Afterwards, our two friends make an unexpected encounter in the garden: they find a little star that’s eager to see daytime! Alice is only too happy to help it fulfill its dream. But when it starts gradually losing its star dust, they realize there’s a risk it might not be able to rise back into the sky to shine once again alongside its relatives. Alice and Lewis must prevent that danger from occurring, ASAP! And so off they head to the Valley of the Night!

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: Tooth the Rescue! When one of Lewis’ teeth falls out, no little tooth fairy comes to see him. Instead, the whole of Wonderland converges upon him! Basically, in this world, a loose tooth is an opportunity for making a wish, which makes it a very sought-after commodity among the Wonderlanders!! In the midst of all this squabbling, Alice must use cunning to help her good friend Lewis hold onto his precious tooth!

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Space Oddity. When a prized possession goes missing, Slippy’s sure the mysterious Alien Silicon Jellyfish took it! Ella’s pretty sure the Jellyfish doesn’t exist... but as the gang hunts for it, Ella learns that supporting her friend is what matters most!

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Downton Tabby. In a post-Edwardian era, Tom lives in the basement of an impressive manor belonging to an aristocratic family. When the Butler asks him to rid the house of a troublesome mouse upstairs, he also promises him a life of comfort upstairs if he succeeds. Unfortunately for Tom, Jerry overheard the entire conversation, making Tom's opportunity all the more challenging.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: The iconic cat and mouse rivals are back. The all-new series takes another look at the madcap slapstick and never-ending battle that has made Tom and Jerry two of the most beloved characters of all time.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Pillow Case. Unable to sleep because of the incessant barking from a dog somewhere in the city, Tom and Jerry must track down the noisy mutt. When they find the dog with the help of a friendly bat, they discover the pup can't sleep without her special pillow. Now, for the sake of everyone's sleep, the great pillow case is on!

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Tail of Two Kitties. Ginger accidentally backs her car over Butch's tail. Feeling awful, she brings the alley cat into her home until he's feeling better. Butch is finally getting what he's wanted, much to Tom's chagrin, especially now that Ginger's having him take care of the poor injured cat. Jerry revels in the situation until he realizes that two idiot cats are more trouble than one and Jerry's getting his butt whooped. Now Jerry must prove that Butch is rehabilitated in order to return him to the alley where he belongs and return his life.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Vanishing Creamed. Hildie is mixing a batch of foot balm that'll soften and beautify her gnarly-looking feet. She has Tom rub it in, nice and good. Unfortunately, the foot balm is a little too strong and makes her foot disappear. Hildie's recipe may be a foot balm bomb but it gives Tom a good idea. He'll use it to "vanish" into thin air. Jerry literally doesn't know what hit him when the invisible cat bats him around like a ball of yarn. Tom is unaware when the effects begin to wear off and Jerry is able to defend himself. When Jerry gets a hold of the cream, it's his turn to have the upper hand. A battle of the vanishing cream ensues, each using it in various ways to outwit the other.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Unhappily Harried After. It's Tom's wedding day! He's getting married to Toodles in a backyard wedding that we're experiencing through the eyes of his best friend, Jerry. Puuuuurfeeecttt in every way, then the crap hits the mouse hole: Tom is given Jerry as a wedding gift. When it can't possibly get worse Jerry wakes up and tosses Toodles out of the house!

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Palladium Quest. When a friendly game accidentally breaks Maggie, Ella and co set out to find a rare metal to help fix her. But it’s a metal so rare it’s only in asteroids! After a few unsuccessful attempts, they realize the knowledge Maggie gave them before she broke could help save the day!

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Friendship Supernova. Slippy wants to watch an eclipse so badly that he makes special safety goggles for himself and his friends. But Ella has a different plan. When she insists on going to watch a binary star supernova, Slippy opts out and heads off on his own.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: Meet the Batwheels
programme.sub-title: I’ll Be Your Shelter. A musical tribute to Ace, the super-brave bat-hound!
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.sub-title: Bean's Safari. Mr Bean finds himself babysitting a baboon.
programme.desc: Join the strange but hilariously funny Mr Bean and his stuffed teddy on adventures such as avoiding an irate landlady or an evil one-eyed cat.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: A Round of Golf. Mr Bean fancies a game of golf so he creates his own golf course inside his flat and invites Irma to join him for a round. Their somewhat eccentric game takes them from sitting room to bathroom and through Mrs Wicket’s flat as they battle to be the winner of the First Bean Open Championship.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Superhero Bean. A crafty cat burglar is causing alarm and concern throughout the town with a series of daring rooftop robberies. After Mrs Wicket’s house is burgled and Bean has his wallet stolen he decides the only way to deal with this cunning housebreaker is to don a costume and become a superhero (like the ones in his favourite comic book). But Super Bean soon finds he has his hands full helping to rescue cats stuck in trees and old ladies with their spilled shopping.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: What a load of Rubbish. Mr Bean is tidying his flat and chucking out a load of old unwanted junk. Unfortunately during the big clear out Teddy accidentally falls into a bin bag which gets put out in the street. Bean is horrified when the rubbish van arrives and he realises that dear old Teddy is now on his way to the landfill. Bean races across town to the dump but how will he ever find his friend amongst all the mountains of junk?

programme.title: Thomas & Friends - Shorts XXV
programme.sub-title: Percy and the Skunks
programme.desc: Percy and the Skunks

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings III
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege" except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Alice & Lewis
programme.desc: Six-year-old Alice has a magical key that leads her to Wonderland. In this “other realm”, she’s met an endearing rabbit, Lewis, and the two have become fast friends – best friends to be exact! Alice loves going to Wonderland and teaming up with Lewis and her other friends, even if it means contending with the whimsical, hot-headed Queen. Each episode entails a visit to Wonderland, where Alice experiences a wacky adventure with Lewis, confronting the crazy, eccentric rules and conventions that reign supreme in this parallel Kingdom. Alice’s adventures always begin in the “real world” where she is faced with a particular situation. Her far-fetched experiences in Wonderland lead her to a positive outcome or gain insight which helps her to resolve this dilemma and thus, at the end of each episode, she returns happily to the real world.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz III
programme.desc: DOROTHY AND THE WIZARD OF OZ is an animated comedy fantasy series that transports viewers back to the wonderful land of Oz. Following the defeat of the Wicked Witch of the West, Dorothy Gale (GREY DeLISLE) has been appointed Princess of Emerald City by Queen Ozma. Faced with obstacles at every turn – from flying monkeys to her arch nemesis, Wilhelmina (the Wicked Witch of the West's niece and protégé) – Dorothy bravely tackles her royal duties with her feet firmly planted in her magical ruby slippers.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Mike, a refined pug with sophisticated tastes, longs for a quiet life but is instead forced to defend his house from a bunch of furry intruders. Raccoons, turtles and Fluffy the Cat have a knack for showing up at the worst possible moments, dragging Mike into a series of unforeseen twists and turns! After his owners return, an exhausted Mike finds himself in the dog house once again, missing yet another opportunity to impress Cindy, the neighbor's elegant dog.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz III
programme.desc: Guardians of the Gates of Yawn. The Wicked Witch follows a clue on the silver slippers to Emerald City Clock Tower, putting all the guards in her way to sleep with a very powerful potion. But she gets more than she bargained for when she accidentally sets off every single alarm clock in the whole place and awakens the Quox, a giant silver beast slumbering beneath Emerald City! While Dorothy and friends are preoccupied with trying to deal with that thing, the witches dive deep into the tunnel the Quox came from for signs of the silver slippers. Dorothy and friends figure out the only way to deal with the beast is to put it back to sleep. And the only way to do it is by stealing the Wicked Witch's sleeping potion!

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz III
programme.desc: Trip to the Moon. When a meteor comes crashing to Oz, Dorothy and the gang discover that it contains a clue that could lead them to the location of the silver slippers, all the way up on the moon! Enlisting the help of Smith and Tinker, the guys build a space ship that sends them right to the moon. But the Wicked Witch and Wilhelmina are right on their tail with a rocket ship of their own. Dorothy and friends land on the moon and with the help of the moon's residents, the Moonies, they find the clue that may finally lead them to the silver slippers' location. But the Wicked Witch is determined to get it first.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz III
programme.desc: The Good the Wicked and the Silver Part 1. When they put all the clues for the silver slippers together, Dorothy and friends discover that the answer is through hole in the ground the Quox made. Taking the drill coaster down through the tunnel, they evade the Quox and end up on the bottom side of the world where the Silver Fortress awaits them. They enter the Fortress, evading traps and magical guards and making it all the way to the top of the highest tower where the silver slippers reside. But just as Dorothy can get her hands on the slippers, the Wicked Witch swipes them away, taking them for herself!

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz III
programme.desc: The Good the Wicked and the Silver Part 2. The Wicked Witch has taken the silver slippers and now the entire Silver Fortress and its silver army is under her command! Dorothy and her friends escape the fortress and go back to Oz to try to warn everyone, but the Wicked Witch is right behind them, riding on the back of the Quox. The Witch tells them that Dorothy must surrender the ruby slippers to her before the silver army gets there and marches on Emerald City. But Dorothy and friends refuse to go down without a fight. And they have some volunteers to help: Baron Fernando Von Soozle, the infamous Witch Hunter, is back. But this time he's brought an entire League of Witch Hunters to help them take on the Wicked Witch. Will it be enough? Well, it'll have to do for right now.

programme.title: Alice & Lewis
programme.desc: Six-year-old Alice has a magical key that leads her to Wonderland. In this “other realm”, she’s met an endearing rabbit, Lewis, and the two have become fast friends – best friends to be exact! Alice loves going to Wonderland and teaming up with Lewis and her other friends, even if it means contending with the whimsical, hot-headed Queen. Each episode entails a visit to Wonderland, where Alice experiences a wacky adventure with Lewis, confronting the crazy, eccentric rules and conventions that reign supreme in this parallel Kingdom. Alice’s adventures always begin in the “real world” where she is faced with a particular situation. Her far-fetched experiences in Wonderland lead her to a positive outcome or gain insight which helps her to resolve this dilemma and thus, at the end of each episode, she returns happily to the real world.

No other animal dares to contest this 'bear's privilege,' except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Rescuing Roxanne. Playing with Louise and her doll gives Mike an idea. He decides to stage a rescue mission with the doll from the roof of the Mikkelson's house so he can be a hero and impress Iris. But as he prepares to show Iris that he's a real-life superhero, the racoons arrive and ruin his plans. Mercury falls in love with the doll the minute he lays eyes on it while Freddy sets his sights on her sparkly tiara. Now Mike has a real rescue on his hands, all under Iris's watchful gaze. The stakes couldn't be higher!

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: A Sick Trick. The racoons watch Mike enviously as he makes himself comfortable in his living room. If only they could get a piece of that sweet action. Then Freddy has an idea. He crashes into the bay window and pretends to be injured, forcing the Mikkelsens to take him in. Mike sees through the ruse immediately, but if he's going to unmask the scheming raccoon he's going to have to defeat the imposter without getting himself in trouble for fighting the poor "injured" Freddy.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Mike, a refined pug with sophisticated tastes, longs for a quiet life but is instead forced to defend his house from a bunch of furry intruders. Raccoons, turtles and Fluffy the Cat have a knack for showing up at the worst possible moments, dragging Mike into a series of unforeseen twists and turns! After his owners return, an exhausted Mike finds himself in the dog house once again, missing yet another opportunity to impress Cindy, the neighbor's elegant dog.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: Alice & Lewis
programme.desc: Six-year-old Alice has a magical key that leads her to Wonderland. In this “other realm”, she’s met an endearing rabbit, Lewis, and the two have become fast friends – best friends to be exact! Alice loves going to Wonderland and teaming up with Lewis and her other friends, even if it means contending with the whimsical, hot-headed Queen. Each episode entails a visit to Wonderland, where Alice experiences a wacky adventure with Lewis, confronting the crazy, eccentric rules and conventions that reign supreme in this parallel Kingdom. Alice’s adventures always begin in the “real world” where she is faced with a particular situation. Her far-fetched experiences in Wonderland lead her to a positive outcome or gain insight which helps her to resolve this dilemma and thus, at the end of each episode, she returns happily to the real world.

programme.title: Alice & Lewis
